spatial_accuracy.notes: Garage is missing from the 3D render as a separate room with its own walls, instead integrated into the main structure, impacting layout topology and wall geometry. The kitchen wall between kitchen and bedroom 1 is slightly different, and the linen cupboard at the entry is missing. The balcony is also missing. All other rooms and their adjacencies are correct. Relative room sizes are proportional. Many windows are missing.

structural_fidelity.notes: Roof is removed and interior walls are visible. Garage is not fully represented as a distinct structural element but integrated under Bedroom 2. Balcony and linen cupboard are missing. Text labels are present in the 3D render. The model is floating and on a dark background, but shadows extend to an unintended ground plane.

furniture_mapping.notes: Major fixtures like kitchen counters, sink, toilet, bath, and car in the garage are present. Placement generally matches the 2D plan, e.g., kitchen appliances, bathroom fixtures. The car in the garage is appropriately scaled. The 'WM' and '*' for laundry are present. 'ROBE' in Bedroom 1 is present. 'LINEN' at entry is missing because the cupboard itself is missing. The balcony is also missing its indication.

aesthetic_quality.notes: The geometry uses simplified forms but shows some signs of ambient occlusion/soft shading. Surfaces are solid colors but contain subtle gradients/shadows indicating more than flat shading, and no textures. Lighting is soft, but shadows are quite noticeable in areas like under the car, under walls, and around objects. Colors are distinguishable. The view is isometric, 45° rotated, centered, and all main rooms are visible. However, subtle reflections and light variations are present.

detected_errors.description: Entire Balcony missing, entire linen cupboard from Entry missing. Garage is incorrectly represented as a space below Bedroom 2 instead of a distinct room adjacent to the main building, affecting layout topology and wall geometry.
Text labels (room names, dimensions) are present on the 3D render, directly violating the UI/Annotation Cleanliness rule. This results in 0 points for this sub-category.
Multiple windows are missing from the external walls, specifically 4 windows on the longer side (south-facing) and 1 on the shorter side of the building (west-facing, near Bedroom 2/Garage).

Kitchen wall geometry between Kitchen and Bedroom 1 is slightly different, the 3D render shows this wall extending further out than the 2D plan, potentially affecting the perceived size relationship of the WC.

While not photorealistic, surfaces exhibit soft ambient occlusion and subtle gradients/shadows, indicating more than flat shading, detracting from the specified 'flat shaded surfaces' and 'no textures'.

summary: The 3D render accurately represents the internal layout and adjacencies of most main rooms, but critically fails on UI cleanliness due to text labels, and structural completeness by omitting the balcony and the linen cupboard, and misrepresenting the garage. Minor wall geometry issues and missing windows also contribute to a failing score.
